Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) YOU DON'T HAVE TO TRUST REDWING: The Falcon starts the game with the Disney+ #s007 Redwing equipped.

Comments
June 14, 2022
RockyRaccoon
He’s really not that good at all. The redwing is nice, but honestly he himself is for the most part vastly unimpressive. He starts off as a close range piece then turns into a ranged piece, and while you can still attack with ranged attacks initially, his real strength is up close. Stark contrast to the SR Winter Soldier, who oddly enough outshines him in every way. I know Falcon was the star of his show, but good ol’ Bucky seems to overshadow him in a lot of ways. Also, just as Goop already said, starting off with Willpower is a huge downer. I think he should’ve had Combat Reflexes or heck even Toughness instead of Dry Willpower.
June 13, 2022
Oathful
I love this sculpt, but in terms of gameplay he's VERY fragile. Even as a secondary attacker, having no means of reducing, evading, or even increasing your defense is not recommended. He does get Redwing, which can lead to some fun moments, but despite his damage potential I would still air on the side of caution when fielding him. If you have a map with lots of hindering, he makes for decent cleanup, otherwise if you can afford it I would recommend just getting the chase Sam Wilson Cap (although it is a steep price difference as of writing this) Thematic: 7/10 Viability: 5.5/10 Fun Factor: 7/10, leans towards casual
May 7, 2022
Goop
Nothing defensive other than willpower is not great for a figure that likely wants to charge with CCE/quake. I like the RS option that combos well with the TA but overall i just dont see him living that long. Even with the stealth.
